text:
e="preserve">Timothy Lee Lester (June 15, 1968 – January 12, 2021) was an American football professional running back. He played in the National Football League for eight seasons for the Los Angeles Rams, Pittsburgh Steelers, and Dallas Cowboys. He was born in Miami, Florida.
On January 12, 2021, Lester died in Milton, Georgia from COVID-19 at the age of 52.
